verbs.description: Trump [V: will] demand much from Kim while offering little in return , says Ret . Lt . Col . Daniel L. Davis .

[ARG0: Trump] will demand much from Kim while [V: offering] [ARG1: little] [ARGM-ADV: in return] , says Ret . Lt . Col . Daniel L. Davis .
